text: Cool, try to find out about those companies as much as possible, listen/watch/read interviews if there are any make sure your portfolio is tailored to their needs and go for it

Yes, I had a chance to visit these two companies while I was at nextgen, I talked to the artists and talent managers, it's really interesting but they don't have any modelling position open, all they have speculative applications now.

To be totally honest with you modeling is one of the toughest to break into. Everyone is modeler if you think about it because we all started as modelleres when we were learning so quality bar for modeling is much much higher than for other disciplines. You still can do it though, I'm telling you can't it's just you will need to work a lot for it

Tbh, I've heard that alot, its one of the high competitive area that you have to be very skilled at it to get a job.
I'm trying my best to be like that, I'd love to do modelling and texturing than anything else, and recently from the bootcamp I find lookdev is kinda I interesting area. 
I was talking to a lighter at jellyfish, she started as modelling and texturing artist, and slowly she did some lookdev and became lighting artist
She said it's all connected, once you start working you'll find something else interesting
exactly, that's what I mean, we are all modelers in a way and that's why I find it quite cool to go to smaller house first
Check this guys, he was making spaceship everyday, if you have time you could go with 2 day or one but decent one

attachments.title: Spaceship A Day  2017/11/25 -2017/12/03, Andrew Hodgson
attachments.text: I wanted to challenge myself in just opening Maya with no pre planning and just try make up a spaceship concept on the fly in exactly 1 hour. The reason i wanted to try this was so I could make better and faster decisions on the fly under pressure and know what sorts of shapes are more likely to work. These are the first 9 so far of hopefully many more to come. I recorded the process of 005 if anyone wants to see how i go from Maya to Keyshot to Photoshop. <https://vimeo.com/245141799>
attachments.fallback: ArtStation: Spaceship A Day  2017/11/25 -2017/12/03, Andrew Hodgson

text:
Oh yeah, I'm on his discord server, we share works to get feedbacks,
he's great
